info.name: 360Messenger APIs
info.description:
The 360Messenger API provides the WhatsApp HTTP API for sending and receiving messages, files, group chats, contact lists, and more.

[https://360messenger.com/](http://360messenger.com/)

formdata.description:
MM-DD-YYYY HH:MM (optional)
Please send the date and time in GMT. The cron job runs every 10 minutes.

MM-DD-YYYY HH:MM (optional)
Please send the date and time in GMT. The cron job runs every 10 minutes.

MM-DD-YYYY HH:MM (optional)
Please send the date and time in GMT. The cron job runs every 10 minutes.

MM-DD-YYYY HH:MM (optional)
Please send the date and time in GMT. The cron job runs every 10 minutes.

request.description: Get the status of a message.

response.name: Get Sent Message Status
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "result": {
        "status": "NOT FOUND",
        "statusInfo": "user not found",

    },

}

request.description: Show all messages in the system.

response.name: Get All Sent Messages
response.body:

request.description: Show all messages in the system.
Get the status of a message.
Star a message.
Unstar a message.
Reply to a message.
React to a message.
Get detailed information about a message.
Download media for a message.
Download media via URL for a message.
Get detailed information about a message.

item.name: Webhook
item.description:
**Webhook Sample**

- Message
    

``` json

  "webhookUrl": "https://webhook.site/",
  "webhook_type": "webhooks",
  "webhook_group": "sessionWebhooks",
  "dataType": "message",
  "ID": "7959fdfd-17b7-4a55-85a2-16fe80715c1",
 ```

request.description:
The method is designed to send a message(text/media) to a private chat.

**Message Size Limits:**

When you send an outbound WhatsApp message, the total message size must be under the maximum size limit for the channel. An API request with media or a collection of media larger than the size limit will fail with an error.  
For a WhatsApp message, the maximum size limit is 100MB.
This method is designed for group sending.
The method is designed to get status a message id.
The method is designed to get a list of messages in the queue for sending.

query.description: optional, All or part of the number

request.description: The method is designed to get a list of all messages with pagination.

query.description: optional, All or part of the number

request.description:
The method is designed to get a list of all getmessages with pagination and search by number or part of it.

Note that the format of receiving messages is file, audio, image, video and text.

The method is designed to send a message(text/media) to a group chat.

**Message Size Limits:**

When you send an outbound WhatsApp message, the total message size must be under the maximum size limit for the channel. An API request with media or a collection of media larger than the size limit will fail with an error.  
For a WhatsApp message, the maximum size limit is 100MB.
This method is designed to get the ID of the group to be sent in the method of sendGroup.
